message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very useful. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $85 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $85 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $95. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I understand your position, but I am still unable to meet you at $95. My maximum budget remains $85. I hope we can find a way to agree on a price within my budget.
